00001 <?php
00002 /* SVN FILE: $Id: example.com.php 196 2009-02-19 14:59:47Z david@ramaboo.com $ */
00003 /**
00004  * @brief Sample config file.
00005  * 
00006  * This is a sample configuration file for a typical setup (in this case for example.com).
00007  * There are many more possible configuration values. This file just covers the most common ones.
00008  * 
00009  * @file
00010  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00011  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00012  * @copyright   2008 David Singer
00013  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00014  * @version     2.0.1
00015  */
00016 
00017 /**
00018  * @brief Your domain name.
00019  */
00020 define('BOO_DOMAIN', 'YOUR_DOMAIN'); // example.com
00021 
00022 /**
00023  * @brief Debug mode.
00024  * 
00025  * Set to FALSE in production environment.
00026  * 
00027  * @warning Enabling debug mode can cause sensitive information to be displayed. It should only be used in a private environment.
00028  */
00029 define('BOO_DEBUG', true);
00030 
00031 /**
00032  * @brief Production mode.
00033  * 
00034  * Set to TRUE in production enviroment.
00035  * This will enable optimizing and other features that are not normaly done.
00036  */
00037 define('BOO_PRODUCTION', false);
00038 
00039 /**
00040  * @brief Database connection string.
00041  * 
00042  * Use a PDO compatible connection string.
00043  */
00044 define('BOO_DB_CONNECTION_STRING', 'mysql:host=localhost;dbname=YOUR_DB_NAME');
00045 
00046 /**
00047  * @brief Database username.
00048  */
00049 define('BOO_DB_USERNAME', 'YOUR_USERNAME');
00050 
00051 /**
00052  * @brief Database password.
00053  */
00054 define('BOO_DB_PASSWORD', 'YOUR_PASSWORD');
00055 
00056 /**
00057  * @brief The key used for \c MySQL AES_ENCRYPT and \c AES_DECRYPT.
00058  * 
00059  * @warning Be sure to change the default key.
00060  */
00061 define('BOO_AES_KEY', 'LOTS_OF_RANDOM_CHARACTERS_HERE');
00062 
00063 /**
00064  * @brief SMTP server address.
00065  */
00066 define('BOO_SMTP_SERVER', 'YOUR_SMTP_SERVER'); // Gmail uses smtp.gmail.com
00067 
00068 /**
00069  * @brief SMTP server port.
00070  */
00071 define('BOO_SMTP_PORT', 25); // Gmail uses 465
00072 
00073 /**
00074  * @brief SMTP server username.
00075  */
00076 define('BOO_SMTP_USERNAME', 'YOUR_USERNAME');
00077 
00078 /**
00079  * @brief SMTP server password.
00080  */
00081 define('BOO_SMTP_PASSWORD', 'YOUR_PASSWORD');
00082 
00083 /**
00084  * @brief SMTP server encryption.
00085  * 
00086  * \li 2 = TLS
00087  * \li 4 = SSL
00088  * \li 8 = Unencrypted
00089  */
00090 define('BOO_SMTP_ENC', 8); // Gmail uses 4
